# network

**Instance Property**

A string, suitable for display, that is the name of the payment network backing the card.

## Declaration

```swift
DOMString network;
```

## Discussion

The value is one of the supported networks specified in the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/supportedNetworks] property of the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest].

## Accessing payment method data

- **displayName**: A string, suitable for display, that describes the card.
- **type**: A string value representing the card’s type of payment.
- **paymentPass**: The payment pass object currently selected to complete the payment.
- **billingContact**: The billing contact associated with the card.
